page.title: 05Family Life by Rebecca Smith
page.content: Many of the mothers and fathers work most hours to get a decent weekly wage. Most couples have children they rarely see. Many are clothed well and don't ask for much because they know there's no future for someone who has no 'O' or 'A' levels. Kids today get very depressed easily maybe because of family problems or problems at school. One single problem like maybe your father's had a rough day at work and is tired, then other people in the family have to suffer too. If something goes wrong for your dad, he may take to drink and then may lose his job. Your mum tries to keep the family together but she's tired and also depressed. You want to help but you don't know how. This is what many families are like in Britain today.
